articles.title: Oregon reports 1,416 new COVID-19 cases, 5 deaths, uptick in hospitalizations - KGW.com
articles.description: Health officials said Sunday that 20 more patients were hospitalized with coronavirus compared to Saturday.
articles.content:
PORTLAND, Ore The Oregon Health Authority (OHA) reported Sunday that coronavirus had claimed the lives of five Oregonians bringing the death toll in the state to 1,427.
